name: Fi Wi Caribbean Chess
description:
Hey, sit back and relax no mon! Play in full screen and enjoy a taste ah di Caribbean.

_

Fi  Wi Caribbean Chess® is a strategic game in which the user plays a newly orchestrated game of chess. It is a Jamaican-themed game of Chess that features numerous variations and changes that make it fun and local. The reason why this game was created is to make the traditionally slow strategic game of chess more enjoyable for people from the Caribbean. With displays of the Caribbean diasporic culture, the game becomes easier to learn, by giving the players something interesting that they can relate to. The genre is strategic and educational.
